snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include trying to crack a forgotten password guarding a historic Web page and Amazon trying to sell e-books in a land...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include trying to crack a forgotten password guarding a historic Web page and Amazon trying to sell e-books in a land where most people don’t buy them.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Web Page No. 1 and Amazon in China
